messages.text:
Hello rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

change looks good, do you also want to mention how to
update (or install) vet in the help message?

Good question. I'll await consensus on that.

On 7 June 2013 10:47, minux <minux.ma@gmail.com> wrote:
> change looks good, do you also want to mention how to
> update (or install) vet in the help message?
>
might as well say how to install it too, although "go vet" will also remind you

On Friday, June 7, 2013, r wrote:

> might as well say how to install it too, although "go vet" will also
> remind you
>
i remembered that you once said the future binary dists
will contain copy of those programs, if that is the case, how about
we document the installation of those tools in /doc/install/source
as only those who install from source need the info.

and only document how to update them in "go help vet"?

How about doing nothing now, since it's all changing anyway? We'll
only have to come back and fix up whatever installation stuff we write
now.

I'll LGTM the CL as is

-rob

On Friday, June 7, 2013, Rob Pike wrote:

> How about doing nothing now, since it's all changing anyway? We'll
> only have to come back and fix up whatever installation stuff we write
> now.
>
sure. i filed issue 5663 to remind us.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=3378d2483995 ***

cmd/go: update go vet documentation

R=rsc, minux.ma, r
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/10110043

subject: code review 10110043: cmd/go: update go vet documentation
